pageTitle: Best Financial Advisors in Santa Rosa
metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Santa Rosa. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Mark P Dunn, CFP®|ChFC®|CEPA®|RICP®|ABFP®|CLU®|AAMS®|CRPC™|AWMA®|CRPS™

heroDescription: Santa Rosa, California, is a vibrant city in Sonoma County known for its rich cultural heritage and beautiful landscapes.
landscapeDescription: The economy of Santa Rosa is diverse, with strengths in agriculture, healthcare, and technology. The city benefits from its proximity to the San Francisco Bay Area.
uniqueNeeds: Santa Rosa requires tailored financial strategies due to its unique economic landscape and demographic trends.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Santa Rosa's tech and agriculture sectors face volatility; housing market risks are heightened by demand. Prepare for wildfire risks and diversify investments.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Santa Rosa's economy has shown steady growth, driven by technology and healthcare sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Santa Rosa is approximately $80,000, reflecting a diverse economic base.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Santa Rosa increasingly specialize in real estate and retirement planning.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), the cost of living in Santa Rosa is higher than the national average, driven by housing and healthcare costs.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the Santa Rosa real estate market is competitive, with home prices rising due to limited inventory.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Santa Rosa's business climate is favorable, with support for startups and established firms alike.
